INBOX_MGMT.DESCRIPTION: A channel is the mode of communication your customer chooses to interact with you. An inbox is where you manage interactions for a specific channel. It can include communications from various sources such as email, live chat, and social media.
INBOX_MGMT.RECONNECTION_REQUIRED: Your inbox is disconnected. You won't receive new messages until you reauthorize it.

CREATE_FLOW.title: 选择频道

CREATE_FLOW.title: 添加客服代理
CREATE_FLOW.body: 将客服添加到创建的收件箱。

AUTH.TITLE: 选择一个通道
AUTH.DESC: Chatwoot supports live-chat widgets, Facebook Messenger, Twitter profiles, WhatsApp, Emails, etc., as channels. If you want to build a custom channel, you can create it using the API channel. To get started, choose one of the channels below.

AGENTS.TITLE: 客服代理们
AGENTS.DESC:
在这里您可以添加代理来管理您新创建的收件箱。只有这些选定的代理才能访问您的收件箱。 不属于此收件箱的代理人在登录时将无法看到或回复此收件箱中的消息。
PS： 作为管理员，如果您需要访问所有收件箱， 您应该将自己添加到您创建的所有收件箱中。
AGENTS.VALIDATION_ERROR: Add at least one agent to your new Inbox

DETAILS.TITLE: 收件箱详细信息
DETAILS.DESC: 从下面的下拉菜单中选择您想要连接到聊天室的 Facebook 页面。 您也可以给您的收件箱提供一个自定义名称以便更好地识别身份。

FINISH.TITLE: 已被注明！
FINISH.DESC:
您已成功地将您的Facebook页面与Chatwoot集成。下次客户消息您的页面时，对话将自动出现在收件箱中。
我们还为您提供了一个小部件脚本，您可以轻松地添加到您的网站。 在您的网站上登录后， 客户可以在没有任何外部工具帮助的情况下从您的网站向您发送消息，对话将会在这里出现在Chatwoot 上。
酷，好吧？好吧，我们肯定试着是 :)

EMAIL_PROVIDER.TITLE: 选择您的电子邮件提供商
EMAIL_PROVIDER.DESCRIPTION: Select an email provider from the list below. If you don't see your email provider in the list, you can select the other provider option and provide the IMAP and SMTP Credentials.

MICROSOFT.TITLE: Microsoft Email
MICROSOFT.DESCRIPTION: Click on the Sign in with Microsoft button to get started. You will redirected to the email sign in page. Once you accept the requested permissions, you would be redirected back to the inbox creation step.
MICROSOFT.ERROR_MESSAGE: There was an error connecting to Microsoft, please try again

GOOGLE.TITLE: Google Email
GOOGLE.DESCRIPTION: Click on the Sign in with Google button to get started. You will redirected to the email sign in page. Once you accept the requested permissions, you would be redirected back to the inbox creation step.
GOOGLE.ERROR_MESSAGE: There was an error connecting to Google, please try again

DETAILS.ERROR_FB_LOADING: Error loading Facebook SDK. Please disable any ad-blockers and try again from a different browser.
DETAILS.ERROR_FB_UNAUTHORIZED_HELP: 请确保您拥有对 Facebook 页面的完全控制权。您可以在这里阅读更多关于 Facebook 角色的信息。
DETAILS.TITLE: 配置收件箱详情

AGENTS.ADD_AGENTS: 正在向收件箱添加代理...

FINISH.TITLE: 您的收件箱已准备就绪！
FINISH.MESSAGE: 您现在可以通过您的新频道与您的客户联系。快乐支持
FINISH.WEBSITE_SUCCESS: 您已成功完成创建网站频道。复制下面显示的代码并将其粘贴在您的网站上。 下次客户使用实时聊天时，对话将自动出现在您的收件箱中。

API.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: 已成功更新收件箱设置
API.ERROR_MESSAGE: 我们无法更新收件箱设置。请稍后再试。

SENDER_NAME_SECTION.TITLE: 发件人姓名
SENDER_NAME_SECTION.SUB_TEXT: Select the name shown to your customer when they receive emails from your agents.

FRIENDLY.TITLE: 友好的
FRIENDLY.SUBTITLE: Add the name of the agent who sent the reply in the sender name to make it friendly.

PROFESSIONAL.TITLE: 专业的
PROFESSIONAL.SUBTITLE: Use only the configured business name as the sender name in the email header.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: 无法删除收件箱。请稍后再试。
API.AVATAR_ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not delete the inbox avatar. Please try again later.

FEATURES.LABEL: 特性
FEATURES.DISPLAY_FILE_PICKER: Display file picker on the widget
FEATURES.DISPLAY_EMOJI_PICKER: Display emoji picker on the widget
FEATURES.ALLOW_END_CONVERSATION: Allow users to end conversation from the widget
FEATURES.USE_INBOX_AVATAR_FOR_BOT: Use inbox name and avatar for the bot

SETTINGS_POPUP.MESSENGER_SUB_HEAD: 将此按钮放置在窗体标签中
SETTINGS_POPUP.INBOX_AGENTS_SUB_TEXT: 添加或删除此收件箱中的客服
SETTINGS_POPUP.ENABLE_EMAIL_COLLECT_BOX_SUB_TEXT: Enable or disable email collect box on new conversation
SETTINGS_POPUP.ENABLE_CSAT_SUB_TEXT: Enable/Disable CSAT(Customer satisfaction) survey after resolving a conversation
SETTINGS_POPUP.SENDER_NAME_SECTION_TEXT: Enable/Disable showing Agent's name in email, if disabled it will show business name
SETTINGS_POPUP.ENABLE_CONTINUITY_VIA_EMAIL: 通过电子邮件启用对话连续性
SETTINGS_POPUP.ENABLE_CONTINUITY_VIA_EMAIL_SUB_TEXT: 如果有联系人的电子邮件地址，对话将会继续在电子邮件中进行。
SETTINGS_POPUP.LOCK_TO_SINGLE_CONVERSATION_SUB_TEXT: 在此收件箱中启用或禁用同一联系人的多个对话
SETTINGS_POPUP.AUTO_ASSIGNMENT_SUB_TEXT: 启用或禁用添加到此收件箱的代理人自动分配新的会话。
SETTINGS_POPUP.HMAC_DESCRIPTION: 使用这个密钥，您可以生成一个秘密令牌，用于验证您用户的身份
SETTINGS_POPUP.HMAC_MANDATORY_DESCRIPTION: If enabled, requests that cannot be verified will be rejected.
SETTINGS_POPUP.INBOX_IDENTIFIER_SUB_TEXT: Use the `inbox_identifier` token shown here to authentication your API clients.
SETTINGS_POPUP.FORWARD_EMAIL_SUB_TEXT: 开始将您的电子邮件转发到以下电子邮件地址。
SETTINGS_POPUP.ALLOW_MESSAGES_AFTER_RESOLVED_SUB_TEXT: Allow the end-users to send messages even after the conversation is resolved.
SETTINGS_POPUP.WHATSAPP_SECTION_SUBHEADER: This API Key is used for the integration with the WhatsApp APIs.
SETTINGS_POPUP.WHATSAPP_SECTION_UPDATE_SUBHEADER: Enter the new API key to be used for the integration with the WhatsApp APIs.
SETTINGS_POPUP.WHATSAPP_SECTION_UPDATE_PLACEHOLDER: Enter the new API Key here
SETTINGS_POPUP.WHATSAPP_WEBHOOK_SUBHEADER: This token is used to verify the authenticity of the webhook endpoint.

HELP_CENTER.LABEL: 帮助中心
HELP_CENTER.SUB_TEXT: 将帮助中心附加到收件箱

AUTO_ASSIGNMENT.MAX_ASSIGNMENT_LIMIT_RANGE_ERROR: 请输入一个大于0 的值
AUTO_ASSIGNMENT.MAX_ASSIGNMENT_LIMIT_SUB_TEXT: 限制从此收件箱自动分配给代理的对话的最大数量

FACEBOOK_REAUTHORIZE.SUBTITLE: 您的 Facebook 连接已过期，请重新连接您的 Facebook 页面以继续服务

REQUIRE_EMAIL.LABEL: Visitors should provide their name and email address before starting the chat

BUSINESS_HOURS.TITLE: Set your availability
BUSINESS_HOURS.SUBTITLE: Set your availability on your livechat widget
BUSINESS_HOURS.TOGGLE_AVAILABILITY: Enable business availability for this inbox
BUSINESS_HOURS.TOGGLE_HELP: Enabling business availability will show the available hours on live chat widget even if all the agents are offline. Outside available hours visitors can be warned with a message and a pre-chat form.

DAY.VALIDATION_ERROR: 起始时间应在结束时间之前。
